title: macOS App
description: Same feature as the iOS app (maybe not from the beginning). With iCloud sync for your bookmarks.

title: improved watchOS app
description: Answer Daily Kanji questions from your wrist; watchOS 10 features and style.

title: Improved Search
description: Better prioritization of results, sorting, tokenization of searched terms, automatically solve inflections

title: Tags for Bookmarks
description: Replacing lists; one bookmark can have multiple tags

title: Study words
description: Similar to Daily Kanji, a flashcard like feature to study the words in one of your bookmark lists
